content.raw:
> Would it be ok to hold the tool so that the button is in pressed mode all the time

Yes, that is ok, you can have the button pressed the whole time while holding the tool

> have large buttons around the grasping area

I think we're too close to the finals to be changing the model's shapes. Do you think it's reasonable to get a good grasp of the tool while holding the button?

> Also how close has the repair tool need to be near the leak. 

The tip of the tool needs to be physically pressing against the leak, I added screenshots to the [tutorial](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/finals_task3).
